casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Scott David ALLEN No. 115A04-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 25, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC. Scott David Allen, for Allen, Scott David.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of March 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of March 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 22nd of March 2019 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of March 2019."
